articles.author: Mari Yamaguchi
articles.title: Japan protests after China military jet locks radar on Japanese aircraft - AP News
articles.description: Japan says Chinese military aircraft locked radar on its fighter jets even though there was a safe distance between them, denying Beijing’s accusation of interference and renewing its protest over the incident. Japan and Australia urged calm after Chinese mil…
